\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hobaiah|strong="H2252"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hakkoz|strong="H6976"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Barzillai|strong="H1271"\w* (\w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Barzillai|strong="H1271"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*).

These men \w searched|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H1245"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* family records, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w and|strong="H4480"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w were|strong="H4672"\w* excluded \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* \w as|strong="H3550"\w* \w unclean|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w governor|strong="H8660"\w* ordered \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* eat \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w there|strong="H5975"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* consult \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Urim \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Thummim|strong="H8550"\w*.
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w numbered|strong="H3967"\w* 42,360,

\w in|strong="H5650"\w* addition \w to|strong="H5650"\w* their 7,337 \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* maidservants, \w as|strong="H5650"\w* well \w as|strong="H5650"\w* their 200 \w male|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* female \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*.
They had 736 \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, 245 \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*,
435 \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 6,720 \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*.
